name: Authorizer
description: open source authentication and authorization solution for your applications.  Bring your database and have complete control over the authentication, authorization and user data.

JWT_SECRET.description: Random string that can will be used for encryption the jwt token

ADMIN_SECRET.description: Authorizer admin secret, used to access master data

DISABLE_EMAIL_VERICATION.description: Option to disable email verification while signing up. This is helpful when you want to test a demo without setting up SMTP. If you set this to false, please configure SMTP env variables. For more information Read docs.
